data.title: 2006 Broadway.com Audience Award Nominees Announced; The Color Purple Tops List
data.meta_description: Final voting for the Broadway.com Audience Awards takes place through 11:59PM on Thursday, June 1. Winners will be announced on Monday, June 5. Click
data.text:
A complete list of this year's nominees follows:

Favorite New Broadway Musical

The Color Purple

The Drowsy Chaperone

Jersey Boys

Tarzan

The Wedding Singer

Favorite New Broadway Play

Festen

The History Boys

The Lieutenant of Inishmore

Rabbit Hole

Well

Faith Healer

The Odd Couple

Three Days of Rain

Favorite New Off-Broadway Musical

The Great American Trailer Park Musical

See What I Wanna See
